Awash International Bank (Amharic) bụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa dị na Etiopia nke ndị 486 guzobere na 1994 na ego a kwụrụ ụgwọ nke nde birr 24.2 wee malite ọrụ ụlọ akụ na 13 Febụwarị 1995

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha June 2020 ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwere òkè na isi ego a kwụrụ ụgwọ ya mụbara ruo ihe karịrị 4369 na Birr 5.87 ijeri, n'otu n'otu.N'otu aka ahụ, ka n'ọgwụgwụ June 2020, mkpokọta akụ nke ụlọ akụ ruru ijeri Birr 95.6 yana ihe karịrị alaka 700 achọtara n'ofe obodo ahụ, Awash Bank na-aga n'ihu na-eduga ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa nkeonwe na Etiopia.

E hiwere Awash International Bank na 10 Nọvemba 1994 wee malite ọrụ na 13 Febụwarị 1995 na ndị nwere òkè 486 na ego a kwụrụ ụgwọ nke nde birr 24.2. A na-akpọ ya aha Osimiri Awash. N'afọ mmefu ego 2013/14, ụlọ akụ ahụ nwetara ihe karịrị ijeri birr 1.37, nke mejupụtara 40% nke ụlọ akụ onwe onye niile.
Na 24 Nọvemba 2014, Awash na Misys FusionBanking Essence, ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ ego, jikọrọ aka iji kwalite uto ya na-aga n'ihu na usoro alaka
